body:
**Environment**:
* OS: RHEL 7.7
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Openshift
* Rook version: v1.3.1
* Storage backend version: ceph v15.2.0
* Kubernetes version : v1.11+
* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift):Openshift

When i am trying to use metadatadevice (which was working in rook 1.2.7 with ceph v14.2.8) it is the osd prepare pod is failing and giving the following error.
```
2020-04-20 10:44:10.880645 D | exec: Running command: stdbuf -oL ceph-volume lvm batch --prepare --bluestore --yes --dmcrypt --osds-per-device 1 /dev/vdb /dev/vdc --db-devices /dev/vdc --report
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018194 D | exec: Traceback (most recent call last):
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018275 D | exec:   File "/usr/sbin/ceph-volume", line 9, in <module>
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018320 D | exec:     load_entry_point('ceph-volume==1.0.0', 'console_scripts', 'ceph-volume')()
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018340 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/main.py", line 39, in __init__
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018355 D | exec:     self.main(self.argv)
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018375 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/decorators.py", line 59, in newfunc
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018385 D | exec:     return f(*a, **kw)
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018400 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/main.py", line 150, in main
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018406 D | exec:     terminal.dispatch(self.mapper, subcommand_args)
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018411 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/terminal.py", line 194, in dispatch
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018417 D | exec:     instance.main()
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018422 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/devices/lvm/main.py", line 42, in main
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018428 D | exec:     terminal.dispatch(self.mapper, self.argv)
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018434 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/terminal.py", line 194, in dispatch
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018458 D | exec:     instance.main()
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018490 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/decorators.py", line 16, in is_root
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018499 D | exec:     return func(*a, **kw)
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018510 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/devices/lvm/batch.py", line 318, in main
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018532 D | exec:     self._get_explicit_strategy()
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018577 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/devices/lvm/batch.py", line 329, in _get_explicit_strategy
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018599 D | exec:     self._ensure_disjoint_device_lists()
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018625 D | exec:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ceph_volume/devices/lvm/batch.py", line 380, in _ensure_disjoint_device_lists
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018636 D | exec:     raise Exception('Device lists are not disjoint')
2020-04-20 10:44:32.018661 D | exec: Exception: Device lists are not disjoint
failed to configure devices: failed to initialize devices: failed ceph-volume report: exit status 1
```
title: CephCluster CR is correct but the metadata device is applied incorrectly
